channel.title: Is a Morphagene or Phonogene clone possible with Axoloti?
channel.description: I just started with Axoloti and i am asking me if it would be possible to build something like a morphagene. What do you think?

item.title: Is a Morphagene or Phonogene clone possible with Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @JeromeB
item.description:
@JeromeB wrote:

I had fun with samples in this patch :

[solved] Pd sampler.rockafella example on axoloti Patching
Hi all, Noob question : I try to reproduce B14.sampler.rockafella.pd on an Axoloti patch. Here Sampler_1_5.axp (6.6 KB) a patch that play sample with time compression/expansion by looped sample. [image] But I can't link "chunk length" with the first phasor frequency in order to change chunk size, without change the global pitch. An idea ? PS : my last patch for playing with samples Sampler_4.axp (21.9 KB)

It's not a morphagene clone, but a good start to play with granular synthesis.
Hope that helps you.

Read full topic
item.source: Is a Morphagene or Phonogene clone possible with Axoloti?

item.title: Is a Morphagene or Phonogene clone possible with Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @raimund
item.description:
@raimund wrote:

thank you for the info. I will take a deeper look. the make noise morphagene is the shit concerning eurorack. I had it, sold it, regreted it and now am thinking of doing something similar with the axoloti. At least a phonogene (the simpler, older version) should be possible, or somethin in between: a phonomorphagoloti

Read full topic
item.source: Is a Morphagene or Phonogene clone possible with Axoloti?

item.title: Is a Morphagene or Phonogene clone possible with Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @valmir
item.description:
@valmir wrote:

I just watched a demo video on youtube. From what I understood it's basically a very complex looper, with some windowing capability that moves it close to the granular realm. I think all of this can be patched with the axoloti, check out @rbrt looper objects, and also @SirSickSik Factotum. Good luck!

Read full topic
